CREATE TABLE application.organization_team( organization_id bigserial NOT NULL, team_id bigserial NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT organization_team_pk PRIMARY KEY (organization_id, team_id), CONSTRAINT ot_organization_fk FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES application.organization (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT ot_team_fk FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES application.team (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
